divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside when my 1 year old looked up and pointed at what appeared to be a jet flying from north to south. I noticed that I didnt see any wings so I got my binoculars. The craft did not have any visible wings, it was silver and was about as long as a 747 jet, it also left no smoke trail or did not make noise. It was traveling approximately as fast as a jet would. The weirdest thing about it was that about 3-5 minutes later I noticed a jet coming through very close to the same flight path. I could see that it was a jet because it left a very visible smoke trail. The really weird thing is that the jet was accompanied by another one of these same objects! they seem to be flying together. I wanted to report it but i didnt know who to call. I wasnt sure if it might have been a space shuttle because I know the wings on them are quite smaller but when I went to the nasa site I didnt see any planned activity listed for that day. I just wondered if you might know what this could have been. I have 3 witnesses who seen it.
trends: There has been one other sighting in pavilion
There were no other sightings in pavilion on or around November 3rd 2009
